channel.title: Comments on: Tech on Tap v1.1 â€“ Post-Event High-Fives
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Kendra Little
item.dc:creator: Kendra Little
item.description: That sounds like a great event! Awesome job-- wish I could have been there!
item.content:encoded: That sounds like a great event! Awesome job– wish I could have been there!

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.content:encoded:
Jes,

Will you consider Sunday for this event? I really would love to come, but I don’t drive on Saturday.

item.title: By: Derek Schauland
item.dc:creator: Derek Schauland
item.content:encoded:
Jes –

I couldn’t have said it any better. Thanks for all of the help in getting “the idea” into a room full of people. Working with you and with Mark has been a great experience and I am looking forward to the next Tech on Tap Event in June.

item.title: By: Dustin Mueller
item.dc:creator: Dustin Mueller
item.description: Given that it was a first-time event, I thought it went tremendously! The sessions were perfect, in the proper order, and energetic and fun enough to keep the social drinking from dominating the event. And if the speaker forms and room layout were the only noticeable issues, then you've done just fine.<br /> I am looking forward to having the opportunity to present in June on SharePoint, and hope that goes as well as this one did. Now, to find a specific topic...
item.content:encoded:
Given that it was a first-time event, I thought it went tremendously! The sessions were perfect, in the proper order, and energetic and fun enough to keep the social drinking from dominating the event. And if the speaker forms and room layout were the only noticeable issues, then you’ve done just fine.
I am looking forward to having the opportunity to present in June on SharePoint, and hope that goes as well as this one did. Now, to find a specific topic…

item.title: By: Lauren
item.dc:creator: Lauren
item.description: Good work you guys!! You can probably count me in as a volunteer for you at your next event! Check-in or something simple for the non-techie? I am really proud of you for doing all of this!
item.content:encoded: Good work you guys!! You can probably count me in as a volunteer for you at your next event! Check-in or something simple for the non-techie? I am really proud of you for doing all of this!
